entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. A few rain showers and flurries beginning before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016
